comment:
>>38437155

“She bailed me out, actually. When I was fighting Anax.” You respond. "She added me to her contacts to send a message, but it looks like she cancelled it right afterward."

"Sounds likely. Don't take it personally. She can be a bit utilitarian about these things." Ayla says.

“Alright then. I guess I'll chat her up as soon as were done here.”

“Fair, fair.” Ayla says. “I'm sorry about earlier. Is there anything else you'd like to talk about?”

> Write-in

I'm a bit tired so I'll probably update once more before I call it. As always I'll go ahead and open the floor for Q&A. Sorry about the week's pause, and thanks for playing as usual.
